text: ever since I arrived in the beautiful
country of Iran I've received hundreds
of messages from people telling me to
get out as an American because it's too
dangerous I don't understand why the
world has such a negative connotation
about Iran especially Americans we have
such a strong fear whenever we hear the
four-letter word I have just completed a
two-week trip around Iran and I can
confidently tell you that there is a
huge misconception about this country
what you see on TV and whatever this guy
says could not be farther from the
reality that exists in this lovely
country as far as I'm concerned Iran is
the most misunderstood place on earth if
you are still a non-believer in what I
am saying then let's just play it by the
numbers in the last decade there has
been one terrorist attack in Iran on
June 17
2017 against the Tehran Parliament
building in the US over that period of
time there has been over 250 terrorist
attacks in Iran it's extremely rare that
any tourist is kidnapped held hostage or
killed
of course petty crime exists just like
everywhere else but it's much less here
compared to most places I've been
people are very honest kind and
welcoming seriously they go out of their
way to make sure I am happy and safe on
Instagram I have several hundred
messages from Iranian friends asking me
how I like their country I've never ever
experienced this kind of hospitality I
think it's just bad luck that Iran
happens to be located in an unstable
region if you put it anywhere else on
the map then outside perspectives would
be different and I wouldn't have to make
my argument in this video the truth is
that I feel safer in Iran than in my own
country so the next time you watch the
news and here's something negative about
Iran please think about what I have told
you over the last two minutes and let me
change your perspectives about this
beautiful country my next 13 videos will
be taking you inside Iran on my daily
adventures starting with day one
tomorrow stay tuned for my best content
yet I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I planned to visit every
country in the world
